title: Handicap is something you put on a horse
creator_credit: Peter Brighton, Joan Reidy, Marjorie Fisher and I E A
brief_description: A documentation of the successful integration of a physically disabled person into the field of journalism. Stresses the importance of commencing the integration pocess at an early age and mantaining the integrated contact as the dissabled person matures.
